channel.title: Blogs on My Hugo Portfolio Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on My Hugo Portfolio Site

item.title: How I approached task 02
item.description: Introduction In this blog post, I want to share my journey of creating my portfolio website using Hugo and the TailBliss theme and displaying it on github pages. I watched a 10 minute youtube video on how to create a portfolio website and display it on github pages and followed the steps in it. I faced some issues when I tried to modify the content in my website but I was able to resolve it by searching it up.
